name: Scuba Diving Challenge
description:
Enjoy the thrill of scuba diving on your iPhone or iPad.

Use intuitive thumb controls to easily steer and search underwater through 4 progressively more difficult levels.

Level 1 - find for cans to recycle,
Level 2 - find coins on the ocean floor using a metal detector.
Level 3 - find coins, some of which may be hidden under the surface of the ocean floor.
Level 4 - find both the flight voice and data recorders.

Whenever your tanks run out of air, return to your boat to refill and then you’ll be able to continue your search.

Challenging for all ages.

Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, email, or instant messaging.

Universal App - supports iPhone 4, 5, 6, 6+, iPod Touch, and iPad, including Retina displays. Works with iOS 6, 7 or 8.
